title: Constructing and learning heterogeneous patient graph representations from structured electronic medical records
details: Y Li, M Wang, B Gao, C Zhu, L Wei, X Fei, H Chen - International Journal of Machine …, 2025
abstract: The graph structure can reveal the relationships between feature nodes and improve the performance of feature-based models. However, more research is needed to construct a patient graph representation using electronic medical record (EMR) to …
